rice.description: A staple food crop that thrives in warm, humid environments with abundant water.

maize.description: A versatile grain crop that grows well in moderate temperatures with adequate rainfall.

chickpea.description: A legume crop that fixes nitrogen in soil and grows well in drier conditions.

kidneybeans.description: A legume that enriches soil and provides protein-rich beans.

pigeonpeas.description: A drought-resistant legume that improves soil fertility.

mothbeans.description: A drought-tolerant legume suitable for arid and semi-arid regions.

mungbean.description: A fast-growing legume crop that requires minimal water.

blackgram.description: A legume crop that grows well in warm, humid conditions.

lentil.description: A cool-season legume crop rich in protein.

pomegranate.description: A fruit-bearing shrub that thrives in hot, dry climates.

banana.description: A tropical fruit crop requiring warm temperatures and plenty of moisture.

mango.description: A tropical fruit tree that needs warm climate with a distinct dry season.

grapes.description: A woody vine that produces berries, thrives in temperate climate.

watermelon.description: A warm-season fruit crop that requires hot, sunny conditions.

muskmelon.description: A fruit crop that grows best in warm, sunny conditions with well-drained soil.

apple.description: A deciduous tree that needs cooler temperatures and winter dormancy.

orange.description: A citrus tree that thrives in warm, sunny conditions.

papaya.description: A fast-growing tropical fruit tree that needs warm temperatures.

coconut.description: A tropical palm that grows best in coastal areas with high humidity.

cotton.description: A fiber crop that requires long, hot summers and moderate rainfall.

jute.description: A fiber crop that grows well in hot, humid conditions.

coffee.description: A tropical perennial crop that prefers shade and cooler temperatures.
